title: MySQLRTRIM()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLRTRIM()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Remove trailing spaces from a string:
SELECT RTRIM("SQL Tutorial     ") AS RightTrimmedString;

Definition and Usage
The RTRIM() function removes trailing spaces from a string.
Syntax
RTRIM(
string
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. The string to remove trailing spaces from
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0

★
+1
